description: This file defines an interface 'IRtspClient' within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace, specifying methods for configuring, setting up, playing, tearing down an RTSP client, and managing properties via string identifiers.

classes.name: IRtspClient
classes.description: An interface for RTSP client operations, derived from Core::IUnknown, providing methods to configure, control playback, and set/get properties.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configures the RTSP client with a given service shell.

methods.name: Setup
methods.description: Sets up the RTSP session with a specified asset ID and starting position.

methods.name: Play
methods.description: Starts playback with the given scale and position.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets a property identified by name to a specified value.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a property identified by name.

ctags.name: IRtspClient
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IRtspClient : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
